title: I have item sets but no way to modify them
body: So I have item sets in my games but can't edit them because there's nowhere to edit them in the client but since y'all changed pink wards to control wards, control wards aren't in any of my item sets (despite the fact that I added them a while back, must have just not saved or something) so now I can't add them into my sets and have to flip over to all items to find them.  Minor annoyance.

replies.body:
You can actually create/edit item sets inside the Legacy Client still, but must launch into a custom match within the Legacy client to have the changes saved. Once you've done that, you can launch back into the Beta Client and the item sets will show up in-game. Below is a screenshot showing where you can launch into the Legacy Client from the login screen of the Beta.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
OMG THANK YOU THIS IS SO USEFUL I CAN NOW PICK MY CHAMPION WITHOUT BEING PERMA LAGGED
